article.title: Quantum phases of strongly-interacting bosons on a two-leg Haldane ladder

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the meaning of the dashed lines in Figure 1?
choices: Phase attached to the next-nearest neighbor links (ΦH)

multiple_choice_question.text: What ground-state phase is represented in Figure 2(d)?
In Figure 3, what does the color code represent in the single-particle dispersions?
choices: Phase attached to the next-nearest neighbor links (ΦH)

multiple_choice_question.text: According to Table 1, what is the central charge (c) of the vortex-liquid (V) phase?
